title: Why KONG is the BEST KAIJU!
author: Think Story
comment:
🐒 Is Kong King? Let me know in the comments! 🐒

If you liked this video check out my HUGE 73 Hidden Connections Between GODZILLA VS KONG and the MONSTERVERSE: https://youtu.be/KGZ0stJ1Cxg
Did anyone else say to themselves "That's a lot of fish" when Kong was eating on the boat?
Kong had the same intro like Shrek. Chilling in his swamp, taking a shower, scratching ass...
I have always loved Kong just a little more and this was a great movie
Gojirra is king in my eyes. Got respect for both though.
description:
In this video we take a look at King Kong and debate why he's the best Kaiju/Titan in the Godzilla and Monsterverse.
